full_summary:
Database Administration and Monitoring Services #RFP-397
####################################################

**RFP Reference Number**: [cb-261-73426870](http://cb-261-73426870)
**Amendment Number**: 11
**Solicitation Number**: 397

### Introduction

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) invites qualified proponents to submit a proposal for the provision of database administration and monitoring services.

### Key Highlights

*   **Scope of Work**: The successful proponent will provide proactive management and monitoring of high-value databases and their respective environments.
*   **Notice Type**: The notice type for this call is a Request for Proposal (RFP).
*   **Procurement Method**: The procurement method for this call is a Competitive Open Bidding process.
*   **Evaluation Criteria**: The evaluation will be based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Tender Requirements

Proponents are required to submit a proposal for the provision of database administration and monitoring services, including:

*   Proponents must demonstrate a thorough understanding of current database management practices and technologies.
*   Proponents must outline their methodology for proactive database management and monitoring.
*   Proponents must provide information regarding their technical capacity to provide services.
*   Proponents must submit a detailed proposal outlining the scope of work, methodology, and terms of the proposed contract.

### Contract Information

*   **Contracting Entity**: Office of the Auditor General of Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 240 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0G6, Canada

### Bidder Information

*   **Bidder Contact**: Irena Dule (suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca)
*   **Bidder Phone**: (613) 952-0213

### Tender Documents

The tender documents and amendments are accessible at [tenderNotice](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22317/rfp-397_-database-administration-and-monitoring-services.pdf). Documentation also available in French.

Note: All deadline dates have passed and any information submitted after that, will not be accepted or considered. All documents must be submitted through BC Bid.

The above rewritten text maintains all the key information from the original text while rephrasing it in a more professional style. It also reformats the information to better convey the requirements and details of the tender process. ____
